title: Fraud Alert: Mango People Shop
selftext:
Hey everyone,

I wanted to share my recent experience with Mango People Shop. I made a purchase using my credit card, but it’s been over a week, and I haven’t received any confirmation through email or WhatsApp. Initially, I waited for 2-3 days, but after no updates, I tried reaching out to their customer service.

I’ve called, emailed, sent DMs on Instagram, WhatsApp, and everywhere possible, but I’ve had no response. Yet, they remain active on Instagram, posting stories regularly, which raises some red flags.

At this point, I’m starting to think this could be a fraudulent page. Has anyone had a similar experience, or any advice on how I can get my money back? Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!
comments: If you put your credit card on a website looking like that, you’re on your own buddy. Dispute the charge on your card, and learn your lesson.

As someone who sells stuff online, I would advise you to always speak to customer care before placing the order or read Google reviews of that brand, make sure that there is a phone number which works. If you can't do all this, then stick to Amazon.
Its not fraud i have brought two plushie toys from them in the past. Some error or miscommunication perhaps
